issue.title: [Gandiva] Enable timestamp tests on windows platform
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4541](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4541). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As the timezone database is not available on windows operating system, the cast timestamp test cases that uses timezone apis are failing.

Tests are currently disabled on windows platform. Need to find a way to test the timezone apis on windows.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4541?focusedCommentId=16771505) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3661
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3661>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4541?focusedCommentId=16782955) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~pravindra]` `[~praveenbingo]` any thoughts about this for 0.13? It is not essential if you do not have time

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4541?focusedCommentId=16782969) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
@wesm, can you please move this out of 0.13 ?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4541?focusedCommentId=16865627) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Moved this out of 0.14.0 also. It would be good to figure out how to make Gandiva fully featured on Windows

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4541?focusedCommentId=17565691) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
